Mattar Al Tayer.The meeting approved the Board of Directors’ report on the company’s performance and financial position for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2024, along with the auditor’s report, the company’s general budget, and the profit and loss account. Dividends were distributed to shareholders.During the meeting, members of the Board of Directors were elected for the 2025–2028 term.hashtag#Salik hashtag#SalikTollGates hashtag#SalikDubai hashtag#SalikNewsDubai Financial Market

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.



…more

I enjoy mentoring, reviewing code, and leading feature teams to build modular, scalable products.Let’s connect if you’re hiring or know someone looking for an experienced Android lead who thrives on innovation and user-first development!📫 jsathish.jeyasankar@gmail.com | +91 9025858316hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#AndroidEngineer hashtag#SeniorRoles hashtag#Lead hashtag#Mobile hashtag#Layoff

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

A big step forward in UAE–India ties today. HH Sheikh Hamdan Bin Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum arrived in New Delhi on his first official visit to India. He came with a UAE team to strengthen the relationship between the two countries. This visit is not just about meetings. It’s about building a strong and lasting hashtag#partnership between two close friends.The numbers say a lot. Over USD 85 billion in trade in 2023, with a shared goal of hitting USD 100 billion by 2030. Thousands of Indian hashtag#entrepreneurs and professionals are choosing Dubai for business each year. More than 3.5 million Indians live and work in the UAE. Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

A big step forward in UAE–India ties today. HH Sheikh Hamdan Bin Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum arrived in New Delhi on his first official visit to India. He came with a UAE team to strengthen the relationship between the two countries. This visit is not just about meetings. It’s about building a strong and lasting hashtag#partnership between two close friends.The numbers say a lot. Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Username: Jomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISCJomon Kuruvilla CA, CISA, FIII, CRISC
Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.

If you’ve been waiting for a sign to level up and get on board something special, this might just be it. We’re adding a few key players to the team. All final interviews will take place in person in Dubai, London or New York. 🤝☕️1️⃣🐺 Contract – DubaiTeam up with Zach to help scale our UK/EU contract offering. A core foundation of our end goal, so we’re looking for the top 1% – someone who knows how to build, not just transact. Maybe you’re doing well, but realise it is best to move now before the golden handcuffs are put on. Or perhaps you're hashtag#solo and missing the team culture. Sick of the headaches of chasing invoices, and would rather spend more time doing what you do best.Whether you're focused on Software or Data, or can make a strong case to pivot into these markets, we want to hear from you. If you’ve got the mindset and the motivation this is the platform.2️⃣🦅 Software or Data – New York or DubaiThe US market is part of our DNA. You'll work directly with Nathan and myself who have combined generated over $6,000,000 in the hashtag#USA market. You’ll need to be based in NY, or willing to start in Dubai (yes, that means unsociable hours) with a plan to relocate to NYC.This market is more competitive than ever – if you’re not ready to hustle, it’ll eat you alive. If you’ve got the drive and know how to add value to internal teams and hiring managers, the rewards here are immense. Big BD energy required. Big ambition essential. This one isn’t for the faint-hearted… but the ceiling? Doesn’t exist.3️⃣🦀  Rust & JVM – DubaiJoin Jai and Husnan in one of our fastest-growing teams. Rust is becoming one of the most loved languages globally. After years of hype in blockchain and Web3, we’re now seeing commercial adoption across numerous industries – and it's only just beginning. Someone with experience in the JVM ecosystem or static/low-latency languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin, hashtag#Rust, Golang or C++. If you’re ready to go deep in a market with long-term upside and big growth plans, this one’s for you.4️⃣🐍 Python – DubaiWork alongside Adam and Jack in a team that’s on the bleeding edge of tech. Python is powering the most innovative advancements in hashtag#Data, AI, and ML - and every day brings a new challenge. Someone who geeks out over where the tech world is heading and wants to be part of it. You’ll need some experience in this space, and at least a basic understanding of the ever-evolving world of AI (yes, it’s a minefield, and yes, you’ll need to become an expert in it). But if you’re curious and hungry, you’ll thrive here.💙 What you'll get at UMATR? An ambitious growing company where everyone’s in it together. A culture that’s fun, supportive, and rewarding. Autonomy and a real platform to grow your career with equity on offer for those who add significant value.Interested? DM me. Or share this with someone who needs to see this - I'll offer a dh10,000 referral to fill these key positions. 💰

Who is the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?According to the Saudi Ministry of Commerce, a UBO is any individual who owns a stake in a company or exercises effective control over it — directly or indirectly.Why is UBO disclosure important? ✅ Enhances transparency in business transactions ✅ Builds an accurate and reliable commercial registry ✅ Ensures compliance with international standards📌 Key UBO Information to Be Registered:Full name and ID/passport infoDate of birth, nationality, gender, contact detailsResidential or national addressRelationship with the company and reason/date of update If Ahmed owns 90% of the company and El Fayed owns 10%: ✔ Ahmed= UBO ✖ Elfayed = Not a UBO (ownership <25%)A company with:✔ Ahmed(natural person) – Company Manager →UBO✖ 20 shareholders, all owning less than 25% →Not a UBO👤 Who qualifies as a UBO? Anyone who:Owns ≥25% of the capitalControls ≥25% of voting rightsAppoints/removes the majority of board membersHas influence over company decisionshashtag#UBO hashtag#Transparency hashtag#SaudiVision2030 hashtag#BusinessCompliance hashtag#Disclosure_Is_Your_Responsibility

Post Content:
Beyond the Waves: Can We First Connect the Sand?A few days ago, I shared my thoughts on the iconic Dubai Metro launch and the still-unrealized dream of inter-emirate metro links. Now, headlines are lighting up with talk of a Dubai–Mumbai underwater train. Two thousand kilometers. Under the Arabian Sea. Ambitious? Undoubtedly. Exciting? Definitely.But here’s a question we should ask before diving that deep—can we first lay tracks across our own land?Thousands still commute daily between Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Abu Dhabi. Anyone who's sat through that morning gridlock knows this isn’t just a transportation issue—it’s a productivity issue, a sustainability issue, a quality of life issue.I’m not one to dismiss big dreams. After all, this is the UAE—a country where the word “impossible” often gets quietly deleted from the dictionary. But even the most revolutionary ideas must respect the first principles of physics, engineering, and economics.So maybe it’s time we channel some of that futuristic energy into something a little closer to home. High-speed, high-capacity metro links between our emirates. Efficient, eco-friendly, and entirely achievable with today’s tech.
